overview: This collection of black and white 8mm loops from yesteryear begins with a fun-but-minor excursion into the nudie stag films of the ‘50s and ‘60s featuring British pin-up June Palmer. The rest of the vintage loops contained on NUDE IN DRACULA'S CASTLE are of your average Girl-Strips-Down-On-Bed-And-Gyrates variety. (shockingimages.com)
title: Nude in Dracula's Castle
